Author: Doctordoomduck
Text: Have you tried an online therapist? I know there have been a few news stories about certain websites not being credible, but I think there are still a lot of really great sources out there. If nothing else, try looking for a therapist that’s maybe a little ways away. Not in a separate state, but if they’re a smaller clinic 20-30 minutes away, you’ll probably be able to see them without having to worry about running into them. Plus, patient-doctor confidentially is a thing, especially if you explain ahead of time who you are and why you want this to be a private thing.
